column2: "... Can you hear us? Oh good, we've established communications."
"It seems that the Campship was forcibly taken over by Darkers..."
"However, we can't get a lock on your location, nor can we establish a video feed. Please report."
"What? You said Darker Den...? There's nothing about it here..."
"In any case, we're heading towards you right now, so we'll be there shortly."

"Please head to these coordinates.
We'll be able to collect you shortly. Thank you."
